text:
e="preserve">Eric Stoltz (born September 30, 1961) is an American actor, movie director and producer. He played Rocky Dennis in the 1985 movie "Mask". He was later nominated for a Golden Globe Award for Best Supporting Actor in a Motion Picture.
Stoltz later acted in the movies "Sleep with Me", "Pulp Fiction", "Killing Zoe", "Little Women" and "Jerry Maguire".
Stoltz was born near Whittier, California.
